programme.title: NCIS: Hawaii
programme.desc: The series follows a fictional team of Naval criminal investigators who operate on the Hawaiian islands led by Jane Tennant. The team investigates crimes related to the military and national security. An experimental Naval aircraft crashes on Oahu, Jane Tennant and her team must find who is behind it before classified state secrets are exposed.

programme.desc: Nature is a tempestuous beast, capable of destruction on a level so devastating and claimed the lives of millions.
